name: Flip the Core
description:
In this side-scrolling action game, you can literally flip your screen at will, changing walls into tunnels, a death trap into a passage way, move an enemy from one spot to the next...Unless you truly believe in dead ends...there are none.

Features

• Flip the camera to open up new passage ways and escape routes
• Use different weapons and powerups
• Artistic and unique take on the classic shoot 'em up genre
